name: I Took Over The System Players
author: youth小勇
content: College student, Xing Ye gained the ability to take over another person’s body with a success rate of 100&#37, but by chance took over the body of a necromancer. This necromancer turns out to be the owner of the system, and it’s all because of this system that he’s a corpse after dying. This system gives suicide missions with no regards of the host’s abilities, but Xing Ye finds this suicide system quite compatible with him now that he’s a corpse? “Hahaha, I’m already dead, what do I have to fea
